TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeInfo2 implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.ITypeInfo

summary.span: 提供 接口的托管定义。

span.span: Provides the managed definition of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当本机代码中的 COM 方法返回 HRESULT 时，公共语言运行时将引发异常。The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. 有关更多信息，请参见 [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md)。For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](~/docs/framework/interop/how-to-map-hresults-and-exceptions.md).

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 检索静态函数或变量（如那些在 DLL 中定义的静态函数或变量）的地址。

span.span: Retrieves the addresses of static functions or variables, such as those defined in a DLL.

param.name: memid
param.span: 成员函数的 ID，要返回该成员函数的 DLL 入口说明。

span.span: The ID of the member function whose DLL entry description is to be returned.

param.name: invKind
param.span: 指定由 标识的成员种类的 值之一。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the kind of member identified by .

param.name: pBstrDllName
param.span: 如果不为 ，则此函数将 设置为包含 DLL 名称的 。

span.span: If not , the function sets to a that contains the name of the DLL.

param.name: pBstrName
param.span: 如果不为 ，则此函数将 lpbstrName 设置为包含入口点名称的 。

span.span: If not , the function sets lpbstrName to a that contains the name of the entry point.

param.name: pwOrdinal
param.span: 如果不为 ，并且此函数是按序号定义的，则 lpwOrdinal 被设置为指向该序号。

span.span: If not , and the function is defined by an ordinal, then lpwOrdinal is set to point to the ordinal.

summary.span: 检索 DLL 中函数的入口点的说明或规范。

span.span: Retrieves a description or specification of an entry point for a function in a DLL.

public: void Invoke(System::Object ^ pvInstance, int memid, short wFlags, System::Runtime::InteropServices::ComTypes::DISPPARAMS % pDispParams, IntPtr pVarResult, IntPtr pExcepInfo, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % puArgErr);
abstract member Invoke : obj * int * int16 * DISPPARAMS * nativeint * nativeint * int -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: iTypeInfo2.Invoke (pvInstance, memid, wFlags, pDispParams, pVarResult, pExcepInfo, puArgErr)

param.name: pvInstance
param.span: 对由此类型说明描述的接口的引用。

span.span: A reference to the interface described by this type description.

param.name: memid
param.span: 接口成员的标识符。

span.span: Identifier of the interface member.

param.name: wFlags
param.span: 描述 Invoke 调用的上下文的标志。

span.span: Flags describing the context of the invoke call.

param.name: pDispParams
param.span: 对结构的引用，该结构包含一个参数数组、一个命名参数的 DISPID 数组和每个数组中元素数的计数。

span.span: A reference to a structure that contains an array of arguments, an array of DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts of the number of elements in each array.

param.name: pVarResult
param.span: 对用于存储结果的位置的引用。

span.span: A reference to the location at which the result is to be stored.

param.span: 如果 指定 或 ，则忽略 。

span.span: If specifies or , is ignored.

param.span: 如果不需要任何结果，则设置为 。

span.span: Set to if no result is desired.

param.name: pExcepInfo
param.span: 指向异常信息结构的指针，该结构仅在返回 时才被填充。

span.span: A pointer to an exception information structure, which is filled in only if is returned.

param.name: puArgErr
param.span: 如果 返回 ，则 指示具有错误类型的参数的索引。

span.span: If returns , indicates the index of the argument with incorrect type.

param.span: 如果多个参数返回错误，则 仅指示第一个具有错误的参数。

span.span: If more than one argument returns an error, indicates only the first argument with an error.

summary.span: 调用对象的方法或访问对象的属性，该方法或属性实现由类型说明描述的接口。

span.span: Invokes a method, or accesses a property of an object, that implements the interface described by the type description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过 方法访问 `pDispParams` 参数的值。The values of the `pDispParams` parameter can be accessed through the method. `wFlags` 的有效值为：Valid values for `wFlags` are: |“值”Value|说明Description| |-----------|-----------------| |DISPATCH_METHODDISPATCH_METHOD|作为方法访问成员。The member is accessed as a method. 如果存在多义性，则可以同时设置此标志和 `DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET` 标志。If there is ambiguity, both this flag and the `DISPATCH_PROPERTYGET` flag can be set.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYGETDISPATCH_PROPERTYGET|成员作为属性或数据成员来检索。The member is retrieved as a property or data member.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTDISPATCH_PROPERTYPUT|成员作为属性或数据成员进行更改。The member is changed as a property or data member.| |DISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREFDISPATCH_PROPERTYPUTREF|使用引用赋值而不是值赋值来更改成员。The member is changed by using a reference assignment, rather than a value assignment. 仅当属性接受对对象的引用时，此值才有效。This value is valid only when the property accepts a reference to an object.| 有关 `ITypeInfo::Invoke`的其他信息，请参阅 MSDN Library。For additional information about `ITypeInfo::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
